identity.name: Maria Pita
identity.vibe: Faith, Joy, Youth, Professional, Stage Energy
identity.aesthetic: Modern Pop-Gospel, Dark Mode with Neon Pink Accents, Immersive

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Album titles

visual_enhancers.stage_light: Radial gradient overlays (magenta/purple) to simulate stage lighting
visual_enhancers.texture: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) to prevent flat digital look

layout_strategies.hero: Full-screen immersive image/video with bottom-aligned typography. Parallax effect.
layout_strategies.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for releases and news. Asymmetrical layouts.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous padding (py-24, py-32) between sections. 'Breathing room' is key.
layout_strategies.container: Max-width 1400px for large screens, but allow full-bleed images.

cards.style: Dark surface (#121212), border-white/5, hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300
cards.interaction: Scale up slightly on hover, image zoom inside container

navigation.style: Floating glass bar at the top (fixed), blurring content underneath.

motion.scroll: Parallax on background images. Text reveal on scroll.
motion.hover: Instant feedback. Buttons scale, links change color, images zoom.
motion.marquee: Slow moving text for 'Tour Dates' or 'New Release' announcements.

hero.alt: Maria Pita performing on stage with pink lighting

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Dark Mode' first approach. The site should feel like a concert stage.
Use 'Syne' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
The 'Pink' (#FF2E8B) is your primary accent. Use it for buttons, active states, and subtle glows.
Do NOT use standard Bootstrap/Material grids. Use the 'Bento' grid style for the Releases section.
Ensure the Navigation is sticky and glassmorphic.
For the E-commerce section, keep it clean and minimalist. Product images should pop against the dark background.
Add a 'Noise' texture overlay to the entire body to give it a premium, non-digital feel.
Use 'framer-motion' for scroll animations. Elements should not just appear; they should flow in.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
